FuncDef:
The mld snooping version command sets the version of MLD messages that can be processed in MLD snooping.
The undo mld snooping version command restores the default value. The mld snooping version command sets the version of MLD messages that can be processed in MLD snooping. The undo mld snooping version command restores the default value. By default, the device can process MLDv1 and MLDv2 messages. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6860-SAN, CE6866K, CE6866, CE6860-HAM, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8850-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE8851K, CE8851-32CQ8DQ-P, CE8850-HAM, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the version number of MLD.
The value can be 1 or 2.
